description: Number of unlabeled bisectable trees with 2n+1 nodes.
references: Harary, Frank; Robinson, Robert W.; Isomorphic factorizations. VIII. Bisectable trees. Combinatorica 4 (1984), no. 2-3, 169-179.
R. W. Robinson, Numerical implementation of graph counting algorithms, AGRC Grant, Math. Dept., Univ. Newcastle, Australia, 1980.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: R. W. Robinson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..99
Index entries for sequences related to trees
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_
extensions: a(23) onwards added by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 19 2006 from the Robinson reference
